query: SELECT testId, testType, testCategory, testSuite, testName, priority, isAutomated, testCoverageMethod FROM testRegistry WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY priority, testSuite, testName
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2TnkFjGBKdfpupi.root --database B3x5NWCFiG4wF9DctXvqsL --execute SELECT testId, testType, testCategory, testSuite, testName, priority, isAutomated, testCoverageMethod FROM testRegistry WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY priority, testSuite, testName

rows.testName: Half Day Workshop focuses on #1 critical area

rows.testCoverageMethod: Manual visual inspection + color contrast analyzer

rows.testName: should create assessment with valid data

should return yellow badge for moderate
